Summary: A. Sphere with flames then it vanishes on tape looks good
divs: Sighting DetailsWe where on the freeway it was a clear afternoon the sun except for one cloud looking thing in the sky it had not moved for a few miles so we pulled over and started o record it we noticed it was a small sphere with huged flames two of them it was not miving it was still it had a red light that was blinking really fast the flames had no smoke trail as i was recording it just started to fade away it was the most amazing thing I have ever witness and to have it on a HD Sony camcorder it looks awesome and give me chills wen I stop recording my girlfriend ,daughter ,and nice where in the car also her sister was a few miles behind us and also witness the flames from there car . I think u guys really need to see this video
trends: There has been one other sighting in Fillmore
There were no other sightings in Fillmore on or around September 28th 2013
This sighting has never been favorited.
